install.name: Flex - Fixed Shipping Rates
install.author: Micah Shawn
install.description: Flex Shipping. Fixed shipping cost to set base value of order with percentage of total sale above base value

param.name: FLEX_BASE_AMOUNT
param.label: Charge flat shipping rate to this amount
param.description: A flat fee will be charged if the total value of the cart is less than this amount. If the value of the cart is greater than this amount, a percentage will be charged

param.name: FLEX_MIN_CHG
param.label: Minimum Shipping Charge
param.description: This is the flat fee to be charged if the value in the cart is less than the amount entered above.

param.name: FLEX_SHIP_PERC
param.label: Percentage to charge if total sale is over base
param.description: This is the percentage (of the total purchase) to be charged if the amount in the cart is greater than the amount entered above.

param.name: FLEX_HAND_FEE
param.label: Fixed Handling Charge
param.description: If you want to use a flat fee in addition to the conditional rate, add it here, If not, set to Zero.
